* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Description

Hall Marine Design Ltd has been pre-identified as the single supplier for this procurement. The requirement is to conduct a comprehensive structural assessment of the CCGS Mamilossa, an Air Cushioned Vehicle (ACV), and develop a repair strategy for the damaged hull and structure. The supplier must demonstrate a minimum of 10 years experience working with the Canadian Coast Guard on major structural projects and meet the outlined criteria for assessment.

## Minimum Essential Requirements

To qualify, the supplier must meet the following conditions:

1. A minimum of 10 years experience working with the Canadian Coast Guard on major structural projects.
2. At least one employee with a minimum of ten (10) years experience conducting structural integrity analysis and preparing remedial action recommendations for thin gauge aluminum (3mm and less).
3. At least one employee with a minimum of ten (10) years experience working with Air Cushioned Vehicles.
4. Experience in developing repair recommendations of thin gauge aluminum involving BS EN ISO 15614-2: 2005 aluminium alloy welding techniques and CCG Stir Welding procedures.
5. At least one employee with a minimum of ten (10) years experience conducting aluminum welding inspections.

## Pre-identified Supplier

Hall Marine Design Ltd is the pre-identified supplier for this procurement. The company has extensive experience working with the Canadian Coast Guard on structural projects and meets the outlined criteria.
